name: Recursion Betty
description:
Kill enemies to grow, hurt yourself to shrink. Don't worry, there is no game over, but there's no escape either.

Recursion Betty is an endless experimental game where you can get infinitely big or infinitely small.

Credits:

Agustín Pérez Burgos (RETSA) - Game Design, programming, Art, sounds

Ignacio Pérez Burgos - Music
